body_html:
In equation (4): a^t = W_hh*a^(t-1) + W_xh*x^t yeilding a rank 1 vector of size h. This h_t is also a rank one vector of size h. The batch and time dimensions are not considered here and Gamma and beta are shared (broadcasted) across them.

If gamma was (batch_size, hidden_size) then we'd be learning a separate scaling factor per batch per channel which does not match up with the paper's description.
